toolbox_items.title: Bumper (circle)
toolbox_items.description: Scores points each time when it's bumped. Tip: Place it in the path of the ball that will be launched.

toolbox_items.title: Bumper (circle)
toolbox_items.description: Scores points each time when it's bumped. Tip: Add several close together to 'trap' the ball bouncing around.

toolbox_items.title: Bumper (circle)
toolbox_items.description: Scores points each time when it's bumped. Tip: Add several close together to 'trap' the ball bouncing around.

toolbox_items.title: Wall (rounded)
toolbox_items.description: Does not add score itself. Tip: use it to further 'trap' the ball bouncing around the bumpers.

toolbox_items.title: Wall (rounded)
toolbox_items.description: Does not add score itself. Tip: use it to further 'trap' the ball bouncing around the bumpers.

toolbox_items.title: Bumper (pill)
toolbox_items.description: Scores points when bumped on yellow side. Tip: Make them bump the ball back into the set of circular bumpers.

toolbox_items.title: Bumper (pill)
toolbox_items.description: Scores points when bumped on yellow side. Tip: Make them bump the ball back into the set of circular bumpers.

toolbox_items.title: Gate (one-way)
toolbox_items.description: Scores points when the ball passes in the right direction. Tip: Place in the initial plunged ball's path.

toolbox_items.title: Gate (one-way)
toolbox_items.description: Scores points when the ball passes in the right direction. Tip: bonus points if the ball passed through all gates.

toolbox_items.title: Gate (one-way)
toolbox_items.description: Scores points when the ball passes in the right direction. Tip: bonus points if the ball passed through all gates.
